micros.content:
I like it when Devs of Old Web say that Flutter is not the Future because it would break all the web.

yet a single Ad Block extension ruins 99% of their web sites that dont even load anymore. And these pages have no interactivity at all

# MetaPersona progress

 Finally I had time to implement micro blogging on meta persona profile. I can now embed tiny markdowns, even with images for each micro. 

 Like this: ![3.png](3.png) 

 Micro is a Tweet but in Meta Persona context. Read more about it on *1 and *2 in links section

# First MetaMicro ever.

This is my first Meta Micro post ever added to #metapersona profile

This can have something embedded inside

Or maybe not hehe

 How are you?
